00011 namespace ndarray {

00017 template <typename T, int N>
00018 struct PyConverter< Vector<T,N> > : public detail::PyConverterBase< Vector<T,N> > {
00019 
00026     static PyObject * toPython(
00027         Vector<T,N> const & input 
00028     ) {
00029         PyObject * r = PyTuple_New(N);
00030         for (int i=0; i<N; ++i) {
00031             PyTuple_SET_ITEM(r,i,PyConverter<T>::toPython(input[i]));
00032         }
00033         return r;
00034     }
00035 
00040     static PyTypeObject const * getPyType() { return &PyTuple_Type; }
00041 
00050     static bool fromPythonStage1(
00051         PyPtr & p 
00055     ) {
00056         if (!PySequence_Check(p.get())) {
00057             PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError,"Expected a Python sequence of length %i.",N);
00058             return false;
00059         }
00060         if (PySequence_Size(p.get()) != N) {
00061             PyErr_Format(PyExc_ValueError,"Incorrect sequence length for Vector<T,%i>", N);
00062             return false;
00063         }
00064         return true;
00065     }
00066 
00074     static bool fromPythonStage2(
00075         PyPtr const & p,           
00076         Vector<T,N> & output       
00077     ) {
00078         NDARRAY_ASSERT(p);
00079         NDARRAY_ASSERT(PySequence_Check(p.get()));
00080         Vector<T,N> tmp;
00081         for (int n=0; n<N; ++n) {
00082             PyPtr item(PySequence_ITEM(p.get(),n),false);
00083             if (!item) return false;
00084             if (!PyConverter<T>::fromPythonStage1(item)) return false;
00085             if (!PyConverter<T>::fromPythonStage2(item,tmp[n])) return false;
00086         }
00087         output = tmp;
00088         return true;
00089     }
00090 
00091 };
